ModMetaData.name: AutoClean Floors (ever everclean)
ModMetaData.author: tremeloe
ModMetaData.description:
The AutoClean Floors are always clean, you'll don't have to worry about cleanliness again.
General • Add: AutoClean Floor and AutoClean Carpet. They never get filth or snow (seriously!). • Actually when you build it, you have to clean the dirt once. But it's just one time. • These floors are late-game oriented. I'm considering making a lite version.
AutoClean Floor • Never get filth or snow. Neutral beautiness.
AutoClean Carpet • Never get filth or snow. Very beauty, speed bonus.
Compatibilities • Compatible with other mods and existent saves.
